```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(cowplot) #Allows for side by side graphs
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(stargazer)
library(kableExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(stringr)
library(haven)
ui <- read_csv("C:/Users/user/Desktop/4th Economy/data/ui.csv")
```

```{r}
#ui_StateFips[] <- lapply(ui_StateFips, function(x)
#type.convert(as.character(x),as.is = TRUE))
#str(ui_StateFips)
ui_StateFips <- ui
ui_StateFips <- filter(ui_StateFips)
ui_StateFips$FiledWeekEnded <- as.Date(ui_StateFips$FiledWeekEnded,"%m/%d/%Y")
class(ui_StateFips$FiledWeekEnded)
ui$early <- ifelse(ui$StateFips %in% c('1','2','4','5','12','13','16','18','19','24','28','29','30','31','33','38','39','40','46','45','47','48','49','54','56'),1,0)
ui$ContinuedClaims <- as.numeric(ui$ContinuedClaims)
#View(ui)
class(ui$ContinuedClaims)
is.data.frame(ui)
is.numeric(ui)
str(ui)
```

```{r}
#Alabama ended the UI benefits on 19 June 2021
# The trend line shows that UI claims fell when the state stopped the UI benefits and UI claims are now below the pre-pandemic period as at 31 December 2021
ui_new <- ui_StateFips
ui_new$lContinuedClaims<-log(ui_new$ContinuedClaims)
#View(ui_new)
ui_new1 <- filter(ui_new, Year > 2019, StateFips == 1)
ui_new1_6.25 <- hpfilter(ui_new1$lContinuedClaims , freq = 6.25,type = "lambda")
ui_new1$ContinuedClaims_T6.25 <- ui_new1_6.25$trend
ui_new1$ContinuedClaims_C6.25 <- ui_new1_6.25$cycle
plot1<-ggplot(data=ui_new1,group = 1)+ 
geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=lContinuedClaims,color='Log Continued Claims'),size=1) + geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=ContinuedClaims_T6.25,color='Log Continued Claims Secular'),linetype=1,size=1) +xlab("Filed Week Ended")+ylab("")+scale_colour_manual(name="",values=c('Log Continued Claims'='blue','Log Continued Claims Secular'='red'))+ggtitle('Continued Claims Trend')+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1))

plot2<-ggplot(data=ui_new1)+ 
geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=ContinuedClaims_C6.25,color='Log Continued Claims Cycle'),size=1,linetype=1)  +xlab("Filed Week Ended")+ylab("")+scale_colour_manual(name="",values=c('Log Continued Claims Cycle'='blue'))+ggtitle('Continued Claims Cycle')+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1))
```

```{r}

plot_grid(plot1, plot2,ncol = 1,align = 'v')
```
```{r}
#Alaska ended the UI benefits on 12 June 2021
#The secular trend shows that UI benefits in Alaska was oscillating on and down before covid period, fell after the state ended the UI benefits in June 2021 but claims increased again towards the end of 2021
ui_new <- ui_StateFips
ui_new$lContinuedClaims<-log(ui_new$ContinuedClaims)
#View(ui_new)
ui_new2 <- filter(ui_new, Year > 2019, StateFips == 2)
ui_new2_6.25 <- hpfilter(ui_new2$lContinuedClaims , freq = 6.25,type = "lambda")
ui_new2$ContinuedClaims_T6.25 <- ui_new2_6.25$trend
ui_new2$ContinuedClaims_C6.25 <- ui_new2_6.25$cycle
plot3<-ggplot(data=ui_new2,group = 1)+ 
geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=lContinuedClaims,color='Log Continued Claims'),size=1) + geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=ContinuedClaims_T6.25,color='Log Continued Claims Secular'),linetype=1,size=1) +xlab("Filed Week Ended")+ylab("")+scale_colour_manual(name="",values=c('Log Continued Claims'='blue','Log Continued Claims Secular'='red'))+ggtitle('Continued Claims Trend')+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1))

plot4<-ggplot(data=ui_new2)+ 
geom_line(aes(x=FiledWeekEnded,y=ContinuedClaims_C6.25,color='Log Continued Claims Cycle'),size=1,linetype=1)  +xlab("Filed Week Ended")+ylab("")+scale_colour_manual(name="",values=c('Log Continued Claims Cycle'='blue'))+ggtitle('Continued Claims Cycle')+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1))
```

```{r}
plot_grid(plot3, plot4,ncol = 1,align = 'v')
```
